Source code for snapshotter.auth.settings.settings_models

from typing import Optional

from pydantic import BaseModel



[docs]class RedisConfig(BaseModel):
    host: str = '127.0.0.1'
    port: int = 6379
    db: int = 0
    password: Optional[str] = None




[docs]class ServerListenerConfig(BaseModel):
    host: str = '0.0.0.0'
    port: int




[docs]class AuthSettings(BaseModel):
    redis: RedisConfig
    bind: ServerListenerConfig
